languages.text: Тервантьяс готов покровительствовать Лорд-капитану. Но для этого е{mf|му|й} предстоит преподать урок культу ведьм, убив нескольких их бойцов на арене.
Tervantias is ready to offer his patronage to the Lord Captain. But first, {mf|he|she} will have to teach the Wych Cult a lesson by killing several of their fighters in the arena.
languages.original_text: Тервантьяс готов покровительствовать Лорд-капитану. Но для этого е{mf|му|й} предстоит преподать урок культу ведьм, убив нескольких их бойцов на арене.

traits.locale_text: Tervantias is ready to offer his patronage to Lord Captain. But first, {mf|he|she} will have to teach the Wych cult a lesson by killing several of their fighters in the arena.
Tervantias is ready to offer his patronage to the Lord Captain. But first, {mf|he|she} will have to teach the Wych Cult a lesson by killing several of their fighters in the arena.
Tervantias is ready to offer his patronage to the Lord Captain. But first, {mf|he|she} will have to teach the Wych Cult a lesson by killing several of their fighters in the arena.

languages.text: Tervantias est prêt à offrir son soutien {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}, mais d'abord, {mf|celui-ci|celle-ci} va devoir donner une leçon au Culte Céraste en tuant plusieurs de ses combattants dans l'arène.
languages.original_text: Tervantias is ready to offer his patronage to the Lord Captain. But first, {mf|he|she} will have to teach the Wych Cult a lesson by killing several of their fighters in the arena.

traits.locale_text: Tervantias est prêt à offrir son soutien {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}, mais d'abord, {mf|celui-ci|celle-ci} va devoir donner une leçon au Culte Céraste en tuant plusieurs de ses combattants dans l'arène.

languages.text: 特万提亚斯愿意向行商浪人提供援助，但在此之前，{mf|他|她}必须先杀掉巫灵教派的战士，给那些人一个教训。
languages.original_text: Tervantias is ready to offer his patronage to the Lord Captain. But first, {mf|he|she} will have to teach the Wych Cult a lesson by killing several of their fighters in the arena.

traits.locale_text: 特万提亚斯愿意向行商浪人提供援助，但在此之前，{mf|他|她}必须先杀掉巫灵教派的战士，给那些人一个教训。

languages.text: テルヴァンティアスはロード・キャプテンに支援を申し出る用意がある。しかしまず、闘技場で魔女団のファイターを数名殺して教訓を教えてやる必要がある。
languages.original_text: Tervantias is ready to offer his patronage to the Lord Captain. But first, {mf|he|she} will have to teach the Wych Cult a lesson by killing several of their fighters in the arena.

traits.locale_text: テルヴァンティアスはロード・キャプテンに支援を申し出る用意がある。しかしまず、闘技場で魔女団のファイターを数名殺して教訓を教えてやる必要がある。

languages.text: Tervantias ist bereit, dem Lord Captain ihre Gunst zu gewähren. Doch zunächst muss der Lord Captain dem Hekatarii-Kult eine Lektion erteilen und mehrere von dessen Kämpfern in der Arena töten.
languages.original_text: Tervantias is ready to offer his patronage to the Lord Captain. But first, {mf|he|she} will have to teach the Wych Cult a lesson by killing several of their fighters in the arena.

traits.locale_text: Tervantias ist bereit, dem Lord Captain ihre Gunst zu gewähren. Doch zunächst muss der Lord Captain dem Hekatarii-Kult eine Lektion erteilen und mehrere von dessen Kämpfern in der Arena töten.

languages.text: Tervantias está listo para ofrecer su patrocinio a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Sin embargo, primero tendrá que darle una lección al Culto de Brujas matando a sus guerreros en la arena.
languages.original_text: Tervantias is ready to offer his patronage to the Lord Captain. But first, {mf|he|she} will have to teach the Wych Cult a lesson by killing several of their fighters in the arena.

traits.locale_text: Tervantias está listo para ofrecer su patrocinio a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Sin embargo, primero tendrá que darle una lección al Culto de Brujas matando a sus guerreros en la arena.

languages.text: Tervantias, Lord Kaptan'a desteğini sunmaya hazır. Fakat önce arenada birkaç dövüşçülerini öldürerek Viç Tarikatı'na bir ders vermesi gerekecek.
languages.original_text: Tervantias is ready to offer his patronage to the Lord Captain. But first, {mf|he|she} will have to teach the Wych Cult a lesson by killing several of their fighters in the arena.
